autobiography.title: Autobiography
autobiography.name: My name is Estefano Chac√≥n, I am
autobiography.p: and I am {{age}} years old, for years now I fell in love with programming and especially web development, although lately I have learned what is necessary to develop apps for phones. For the simple reason that I consider myself a person who likes logic and solving problems, I would love to dedicate my whole life to this profession, always updating myself according to technology and its trends.

experience.title: Experience
experience.p1: I will show some pages in which I have worked as proof of my experience:
experience.p2: I am not responsible for any major change in these pages or change of hosting, so I will leave a representative image.

data.title: Packachange
data.description: In this project I am currently in charge of the FrontEnd

data.title: Celta
data.description: In this project made in Wordpress I have worked on the logic of its payment form and many other functions, in addition to improving and fixing style errors.

data.title: Veronica Propiedades
data.description: This project made in Wordpress I have worked on the logic of the conversion of live prices from Chilean pesos to dollars and other necessary style changes

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.tab-technology-p: The technologies used in this project were:

data.title: Rapidito Yaa!
data.description: The start of this project was by a client who had in mind to create an app in the style of 'Uber', which would work hand in hand with the google maps API in real time, for the FrontEnd part, use React Native technology for the app and Reactjs for the web page which includes an administrator panel, in turn it is connected with the power of Firebase in Backend. As a result, this peculiar app was quite intuitive, functional and fast despite the use of the different Google APIs.
objectives: Create an administration panel that works in real time with the App
Provide a seamless user experience
Have the possibility to leave comments and reviews to the drivers
Learn more about React Native and Google APIs
Create an interconnected data structure with a non-relational database
A functional app on both Android and iPhone

data.title: Beat Place
data.description: The idea of this project was born thanks to my passion for music, the idea was to create an App with React Native, where beats can be uploaded and listened to locally, hand in hand with ExpressJs in Backend to create a fairly complete Creation API. user, editing, beat creation, beat editing, the option of being a user or a beatmaker and of course a search engine. Following the respective security patterns such as jwt and authentication.
objectives: Create an API with strong security integration
Strengthen knowledge in React Native
Learn much more about how Axios works
Learn different ways to connect the Backend with the FrontEnd natively

data.title: Urban Style
data.description: In this project I proposed to make a page from scratch that has functionality and works with a database in a fluid way, maintaining the theme of urban clothing, having as a general basis the technology of React and taking advantage of all the tools that it offers, such as its dependencies and integration with the DOM.
objectives: Get an interactive experience
Learn more about how React and Firebase work
Make a search engine with real-time filtering
Import several images at the same time with the help of a loop without having to do it manually

data.title: Game Room
data.description: A one-page application where you will find a collection of 4 games, with their change of difficulty, time management and scores in general. A total challenge in terms of the logic involved in making interactive games only with Javascript, since you have to create the artificial intelligence of some CPU
objectives: Handling the states in the single page application
Creating an AI to make competitive games
Understanding of Next.js and all its tools
Interactive and attractive UI and UX

data.title: Breaking Bad
data.description: A simple project designed to capture what has been learned about API calls, callbacks and handling of requests and information in an asynchronous way, with an integration at the same time of a filter of all the information returned accompanied by a subtle style that matches to the initial theme.
objectives: Correct control of API information
Fully understand asynchronous functions in javascript
A Lazyload of all the information based on the scroll
Make a filter that handles several options without any collision

data.title: Arquitectura Bosque
data.description: Rural architecture is the basis of this static page design made with the aim of continuing to master the tools that bootstrap offers.
objectives: Fully master Bootstrap 5
Make a minimalist design

data.title: RealState GDl
data.description: Design created only with Html and Css, maintaining the best possible use of semantics and at the same time wanting to convey luxury in the general design of the web page.
objectives: Fully master Bootstrap 5
Get the best possible semantics offered by Html 5
